title: Resgatar configurações das pastas do Thunderbird
content: Boa noite, Fazia uso do Thunderbird em um laptop Dell com Manjaro. Durante problemas de atualização do sistema, fiz errroneamente atualização parcial do sistema. Em resumo, terei que fazer reinstalação do Manjaro. Estou resgatando todo o conteúdo do SSD. A minha outra preocupação está nas confirmações das pastas / abas do meu Thunderbird. Faço uso do Gmail. Por questões profissionais tive que criar várias pastas e subpastas e preciso levar essa configuração para o Thunderbird no lapto reinataldo. Tem como? Ou essa configuração será automática pois as pastas ficam também configuradas no Gmail? Obrigado.
creator: johnb.acad

title: Installed 105.x.x over 102.x.x and all inbox(es) are missing
content: I was using version 102.x.x without any issue, but them I downloaded version 105.x.x and installed it over the previous one without uninstalling it. Now, I cannot see my inbox(es), though I can see contacts. Please help how do I restore the inboxes.
creator: linguait

title: Getting inbox copied to Local Folders - Unable to set path error
content:
Hi,

In Thunderbird (fresh install of 115.01) on Win 10,

I'm trying to set my (pop) Server Settings Local Directory to:

C:\Thunderbird\Profiles\rxd7d4d1.default\Mail\Local Folders

that is where years of my prior emails are stored. I can see them in the Local Folders.

I'm just trying to make my Verizon mail save locally into that location also.

However, I get the error:

The Local Directory path "C:\Thunderbird\Profiles\rxd7d4d1.default\Mail\Local Folders" is not suitable for message storage. Please choose another directory.

Why exactly is Thunderbird choking on that path? What can I do about it?

This is the path where all my history is stored. I moved there from the Appdata/Roaming area, which has the same problem!

Many thanks to anyone who can provide a precise answer!
creator: steve.johns

title: Supernova 115. What are the possibilities now for changing the appearance so that it looks like it was before?
content:
The screenshot shows version 102. Many people already know what Thunderbird looks like now. What can be done at the moment? I have not set up accounts with mailboxes yet and there are no messages. I'm afraid there will be surprises too... Look at those huge buttons in the upper right corner and the generally thick panel. Why are they like this? 9_9

Thank you!
creator: booya
